channel.title: MSG Sphere on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in MSG Sphere on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Tornadoes, Monkeys and Towering Flames: How the Sphere Plans to Bring ‘The Wizard of Oz’ to Life
item.description: Senior executives from the Las Vegas attraction are recreating key moments from the film inside the venue at the same moment they happen on its massive screen.
